description: A set of reciprocal commitments among economic agents, and/or a set of reciprocal economic events.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the agreement.

created.description: The date/time the agreement was created.

bundledIn.description: Reference to a vf.agreement.agreementBundle this agreement is part of.

unitBased.description: This group of commitments contains unit based quantities which can be multiplied. Default false.

stipulates.description: References to vf.planning.commitment records that are the primary clauses of this agreement.

stipulatesReciprocal.description: References to vf.planning.commitment records that are the reciprocal clauses of this agreement.

realizes.description: References to vf.observation.economicEvent records that realize this agreement.

realizesReciprocal.description: References to vf.observation.economicEvent records that are the reciprocal realization of this agreement.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the agreement.
